<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/e5886ccb5163873dd01fc67b09ab10e681351ee9|patch 8.2.0804: libvterm code lags behind the upstream version>
patch 8.2.0804: libvterm code lags behind the upstream version

Problem:    Libvterm code lags behind the upstream version.
Solution:   Include revision 727, but add the index instead of switching
            between RGB and indexed.

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0804: libvterm code lags behind the upstream version · vim/vim@e5886cc
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0804: libvterm code lags behind the upstream version · vim/vim@e5886cc
attachments.text: Problem: Libvterm code lags behind the upstream version. Solution: Include revision 727, but add the index instead of switching between RGB and indexed.

patch 8.2.0807: cannot easily restore a mapping

Problem:    Cannot easily restore a mapping.
Solution:   Add mapset().

Solution:   Add more tests. (Yegappan Lakshmanan, closes #6069)  Fix memory
            leak.

Problem:    Build failure with small features. (Tony Mechelynck)
Solution:   Move "expr" inside #ifdef.

text:
<https://github.com/vim/vim/commit/2e61e2d08390623fcf933fd06646ac91f81fb772|patch 8.2.0810: error when appending "tagfile" to 'wildoptions'>
patch 8.2.0810: error when appending "tagfile" to 'wildoptions'

Problem:    Error when appending "tagfile" to 'wildoptions'.
Solution:   use flags P_ONECOMMA and P_NODUP. (Dmitri Vereshchagin,
            closes #6105)

attachments.fallback: GitHub: patch 8.2.0810: error when appending "tagfile" to 'wildoptions' · vim/vim@2e61e2d
attachments.title: patch 8.2.0810: error when appending "tagfile" to 'wildoptions' · vim/vim@2e61e2d
attachments.text: Problem: Error when appending "tagfile" to 'wildoptions'. Solution: use flags P_ONECOMMA and P_NODUP. (Dmitri Vereshchagin, closes #6105)

Solution:   Use WaitForAssert()
